thread.title: BRIEF-Horizon Discovery Group Confirms Rejection Of Abcam's Proposal

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Horizon Discovery Group Confirms Rejection Of Abcam's Proposal

organizations.name: brief-horizon discovery group confirms rejection of abcam

text:
May 2 (Reuters) - Horizon Discovery Group Plc:
* CONFIRMS REJECTION OF ABCAMâ€™S PROPOSAL * CONFIRMS IT RECEIVED UNSOLICITED AND HIGHLY CONDITIONAL PROPOSAL FROM ABCAM REGARDING A POSSIBLE OFFER FOR HORIZON DISCOVERY GROUP
* BOARD CONSIDERS UNSOLICITED PROPOSAL TO BE HIGHLY OPPORTUNISTIC BELIEVES IT FUNDAMENTALLY UNDERVALUES CO AND ITS FUTURE PROSPECTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
